roles.title: Project Management Consultant (PMC)
roles.role: Act as the technical manager for the redevelopment project for the housing society.
work: Prepare the Feasibility Report.
Handle the process of selecting developers/contractors (Tendering).
Monitor the construction quality and project timeline.

roles.title: Legal Consultant / Advocate
roles.role: Draft legal documents (especially the Development Agreement) between the society and the developer and resolve disputes.
work: Provide legal advice to the society.
Verify land title documents.
Assist with MahaRERA and other government approvals.
roles.qualification: Expertise in Real Estate & RERA Law.

roles.title: Architect and Town Planner
roles.role: Design the new building layout and plan according to government norms (such as FSI, margins, and height regulations).
work: Create designs and layouts for the new flats.
Submit plans to the local municipal corporation (e.g., NMC).
Prepare master planning for cluster redevelopment.

roles.title: Chartered Accountant (CA) / Finance Expert
roles.role: Manage finance and tax planning in Self-Redevelopment or Joint-Venture models.
work: Manage accounts of corpus fund and profit from saleable flats.
Handle planning for GST and Income Tax.
Assist in obtaining loans from banks (Self-Redevelopment Loan).

roles.title: Contractor / Builder
roles.role: Manage construction work including everything from site preparation to finishing.
work: Demolition of existing structure.
Structural construction and finishing work.
Manage workers and site operations.

roles.title: Material Supplier
roles.role: Supply necessary construction materials (cement, steel, bricks, tiles, plumbing fixtures, etc.).
work: Contract bulk supply with large construction companies.
Deliver high-quality materials to the site on time.

roles.title: Sales and Brokerage
roles.role: Sell the developerâ€™s saleable units in the market.
work: Manage project marketing and advertising.
Show flats to potential buyers and close sales.
Identify land and societies for upcoming redevelopment projects.

roles.title: Developer
roles.role: Take financial risk, invest in the project, and earn profit.
work: Sign agreements with the society.
Obtain government permissions and arrange finance.
Complete the project on time and sell.
